mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( name, email, phone, password, is_enable, display_name, org_id, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag, expire_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{isEnable}, #{displayName}, #{orgId}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{delFlag}, #{expireTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_user SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{value}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT tu.id as userId, tu.name as name, tu.phone as phone, tu.email as email, tu.display_name as displayName,
GROUP_CONCAT(tr.name SEPARATOR ' / ') as roleName FROM tb_user tu
INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur on tu.id = tur.user_id INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tur.role_id = tr.id
GROUP BY tu.id ORDER BY tu.create_time DESC ) a

SELECT tu.id AS id, tu.NAME AS NAME, tu.phone AS phone, tu.email AS email, tu.display_name AS displayName, tu.create_by AS createBy, tu.update_by AS updateBy, tu.create_time AS createTime, tu.update_time AS updateTime, tu.expire_time AS expireTime, tu.is_enable AS is_enable, tu.remark AS remark, GROUP_CONCAT( tr.NAME SEPARATOR ' / ' ) AS roleName FROM tb_user tu INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur ON tu.id = tur.user_id AND tu.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tur.role_id = tr.id AND tr.del_flag = 0
GROUP BY tu.id ORDER BY tu.create_time DESC

SELECT tu.id as userId, tu.name as name, tu.phone as phone, tu.email as email, tu.expire_time AS expireTime, tu.is_enable AS isEnable, tu.remark AS remark, tu.display_name as displayName, GROUP_CONCAT( tr.NAME SEPARATOR ' / ' ) AS roleName
FROM tb_user tu
INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur on tu.id = tur.user_id INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tur.role_id = tr.id WHERE tu.id = #{value} AND tu.del_flag = 0 AND tr.del_flag = 0 AND tur.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY tu.id ORDER BY tu.create_time DESC

SELECT tu.id, tu.name as name, tu.phone as phone, tu.org_id as orgId, tu.email as email, tu.password as password, tu.expire_time AS expireTime, tu.is_enable AS isEnable, tu.remark AS remark, tu.display_name as displayName FROM tb_user tu
LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_user SET
name = #{name},
password = #{password},
email = #{email},
phone = #{phone},
is_enable = #{isEnable},
display_name = #{displayName},
org_id = #{orgId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remark = #{remark},
expire_time = #{expireTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = SYSDATE() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT tu.id AS id, tu.org_id, tu.email, tu.phone, tu.display_name, tu.is_enable FROM tb_user tu LEFT JOIN tb_user_project tup ON tu.id = tup.user_id WHERE tup.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT id, name, password, email, phone, display_name AS displayName, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag, is_enable AS isEnable, data_control AS dataControl, expire_time AS expireTime, remark FROM tb_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND name = #{name}

SELECT tu.id, tu.NAME FROM tb_user tu INNER JOIN tb_user_role tur ON tu.id = tur.user_id INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tur.role_id = tr.id WHERE tu.del_flag = 0 AND tur.del_flag = 0 AND tr.del_flag = 0 AND tur.role_id in
#{roleId}

SELECT id, name, display_name displayName FROM `tb_user` where del_flag=0 and id in
